column4: we've been trying with native drivers, and no dice. I was going to run him up on ndiswrapper - we tried iwlagn and iwl4965, neither run his device
Demon|Ubuntu i think you need the sys file not the inf
it's a bit easier now, ndiswrapper does pretty much everything for you in about 5 commands
I've been using ndiswrapper for about 10 years, you need the .inf file
